name: Rainbow Birthday Planet
description:
RAINBOW BIRTHDAY PLANET

- CONTROLS -

A / D - Switch direction

SPACE - Rainbow boost / restart game

- INFORMATION -

A game by NPJarcade, written in less than 12 hours for Jupiter Hadley's Birthday Jam - Happy Birthday!

- Orbit your planet and bash incoming asteroids

- Celebrate as many birthdays as you can with your planet friend

- Eat cake to ensure your friendly planet stays happy

- How many birthdays will you enjoy?

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2017.

Audio randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone

Additional SFX from FindSounds - http://www.findsounds.com

Music by Kevin MacLeod - https://incompetech.com
